title: Request Internal Direct Debit
---

# Request Internal Direct Debit

import RequestPaymentMethodIntro from '../partials/_guide-request-intro.mdx';

<RequestPaymentMethodIntro paymentMethod="Internal Direct Debit" />

## Guide {#guide}

import RequestPaymentMethodSteps from '../partials/_guide-request-steps.mdx';

<RequestPaymentMethodSteps paymentMethod="internalDirectDebitStandard/internalDirectDebitB2b" />

## Mutation {#mutation}

ðŸ”Ž [Open the mutation in API Explorer](https://explorer.swan.io?%3D&tab=api)

```graphql {4-6} showLineNumbers
mutation RequestInternalDirectDebit {
  requestMerchantPaymentMethods(
    input: {
      merchantProfileId: "15d5ac1d-da75-4a48-98cd-b76c43e16fa3"
      internalDirectDebitStandard: { activate: true }
      internalDirectDebitB2B: { activate: true }
    }
  ) {
    ... on RequestMerchantPaymentMethodsSuccessPayload {
      __typename
      merchantProfile {
        id
        merchantName
        merchantPaymentProducts {
          productId
          statusInfo {
            status
            ... on EnabledMerchantPaymentMethodsStatusInfo {
              __typename
              enabledAt
              status
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
    ... on ForbiddenRejection {
      __typename
      message
    }
    ... on NotFoundRejection {
      id
      message
    }
    ... on InternalErrorRejection {
      __typename
      message
    }
  }
}

```

## Payload {#payload}

The payload confirms the type and the status `PendingReview`.
Also included in the payload is the merchant profile status, `Enabled`.

```json {8-12,14,16,20} showLineNumbers
{
  "data": {
    "requestMerchantPaymentMethods": {
      "__typename": "RequestMerchantPaymentMethodsSuccessPayload",
      "merchantProfile": {
        "merchantPaymentMethods": [
                    {
            "type": "InternalDirectDebitStandard",
            "updatedAt": "2023-06-12T15:25:08.766Z",
            "version": 1,
            "id": "e8e13312-be45-4a76-bfd6-c3e5c6e6fe13",
            "productId": "iddb2b_dfe125ac-da8c-4d52-bb4c-c44c3cc0e8fe",
            "statusInfo": {
              "status": "PendingReview"
            },
            "rollingReserve": null
          },
        ],
        "statusInfo": {
          "status": "Enabled"
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```
